### English to French Translation Services for NSERC

##### Background and Purpose

The Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC) is seeking to establish contracts for English to French translation services. Our Language Services team requires high-quality translation services often delivered within tight deadlines on an as-and-when-required basis.

### Details of the Service Requirement

The selected contractor will provide English to French translation services for documents, reports, and other materials under the control of NSERC. The contractor will work to meet NSERC’s quality standards established in their contract terms and conditions.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

* Technical Merit
* Price
The successful contractor will be chosen based on the combined score of these criteria.

### Important Dates

* Amendment Number: 4 (Current)
* Publication Date: February 6, 2024
* Amendment Date: February 7, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 1, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST

### Location

Contract delivery will take place exclusively in the National Capital Region (NCR), Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

### Selection Criteria

The selection criteria include:

* The highest combined rating of technical merit and price

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
